definition: The HTML anchor tag defines a hyperlink that links one page to another page. It can create hyperlink to other web page as well as files, location, or any URL. The 'href' attribute is the most important attribute of the HTML a tag. and which links to destination page or URL.

attributes.usage: It is a necessary attribute that describes the source or path of the image. It instructs the browser where to look for the image on the server.
